concept.title: Individual Report Suite Settings
concept.shortdesc: The Individual Report Suite Settings let you change the default settings of your report suites. Tools include a way to remove records for unwanted or obsolete pages, set default metrics, and configure report suite segments.

conbody.p: To access Individual Report Suite Settings:

ol.li: Click Admin, then click Report Suites.
Click Edit Settings > Individual Report Suite Settings > <selection>.
